name: Total R&D paid to others, for companies with 5–9 employees, by selected industry and type of R&D performer: 2017
description: Total R&D paid to others, for companies with 5–9 employees, by selected industry and type of R&D performer: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_paid_for_by_the_company_and_performed_by_another_u_s_business
variableMeasured.description: R D Paid For By The Company And Performed By Another U S Business

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_paid_for_by_the_company_and_performed_by_a_u_s_university_or_college
variableMeasured.description: R D Paid For By The Company And Performed By A U S University Or College

variableMeasured.name: field_r_d_paid_for_by_the_company_and_performed_by_other_organizations
variableMeasured.description: R D Paid For By The Company And Performed By Other Organizations

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant establishment payroll. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and U.S. Census Bureau, Annual Business Survey, 2017.
